p: Binary classification models development and validation were carried out by an in-house python script based on the scikit-learn machine learning library [ 23]. First, the data were imported and pre-processed to obtain the independent data matrix consisting of 89 rows (essential oil samples) and 54 columns (chemical components). Two dependent target vectors containing 89 biofilm formation percentage observations at 48 Î¼g/mL and 3.125 mg/mL were defined.
